title: Four Seasons Resort Hualalai offering allows for further personalisation guest experience
text:
GLOBAL TRAVEL NEWS » Four Seasons Resort Hualalai offering allows for further personalisation guest experience Four Seasons Resort Hualalai offering allows for further personalisation guest experience   
Four Seasons Resort Hualalai at Historic Ka‘upulehu, named the Best Beach Resort in the World by Andrew Harper’s Hideaway Report, introduces Oceanfront Concierge Service. 

Allowing guests the luxury of going on with their carefree day, these concierges will roam the Resort’s beaches and seven pools, offering an array of services intended to ease the experience of making plans. On-duty daily from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm, the team will offer everything from making dining reservations to booking ocean activities, creating customised adventures, reconfirming airline reservations, printing boarding passes and more. 

“Everything we do here is built around the idea of pampering our Resort guests and homeowners, and personalising every aspect of their stay with us,” says Robert Whitfield, Regional Vice President and General Manager of Four Seasons Resort Hualalai. “We’re excited to introduce our new Oceanfront Concierge Service, which will further allow our guests to effortlessly and fully enjoy all aspects of the Hualalai lifestyle.” 

The Resort is currently offering the Experience More package, providing guests with a USD 1,000 resort credit which can be applied to incidental charges during their stay, including Spa, golf, retail and dining. This package is valid for stays of five nights or more in one of the Resort’s 51 magnificent suites. For reservations, contact your travel professional (Chain Code FS), call 888 340 5662 or book online.
